__e: Funny, I didn't hear those words come out of your mouth... this morning after you tried to kill me.
That's the only reason why I followed you into any of this, and you tried to kill me for it.
You tried to kill me twice, so I'm sure it doesn't have the same impact, but we're in this together.

When you threatened to kill my mother, it occurred to me that you and I aren't exactly on the same page.

I don't like the way you treated my ma.
